title: Don't have League Legacy Client. I only have the Admin one, what's happened and how do I fix it?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: Don't have League Legacy Client. I only have the Admin one, what's happened and how do I fix it?

replies.body:
Hey there,

That should launch the legacy client, does it not? (lol.launcher.admin.exe that is)
yeah mate, but then my discord chucks a hissy fit and goes all drongo on me and doesn't work, lol.launcher.exe used to be legacy.

Apologies for the delayed response, what exactly is the issue you're experiencing with discord?

I'm assuming you're unable to use PTT or something similar? If so, run discord as Administrator and that should resolve the issue.

For any other issues you'll need to contact discord, we are not discord support.
